text: Nordostniederdeutsch is a variant of the Low German dialect spoken in Mecklenburg-Vorpommern. == Varieties == * Mecklenburgisch-Vorpommersch in former Mecklenburg-Schwerin: Schwerin-Rostock-Wismar-GÃ¼strow, in Western Pomerania: Stralsund-Greifswald-Anklam and in former Mecklenburg-Strelitz: Neustrelitz-Neubrandenburg * Central Pomeranian Category:German dialects Category:Languages of Germany Category:Mecklenburg-Vorpommern
title: Nordostniederdeutsch
